stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.

stadium.name: The Oakmaul Grounds
stadium.description: Built over the site of the final battle during the liberation of Hafting now rises The Oakmaul Grounds‚Äîpart arena, part monument. The central oak still bears the burn scars of the final battle. Troll ball here feels more like ritual than sport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Wiggling their fingers in a complex, magical-looking pattern.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Organizing a small betting pool on who will score first.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Anointing their forehead with morning dew.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Anointing their forehead with morning dew.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL PRE-GAME SPECTACULAR! 

Hello there, sports fans, ghouls, and battle-hardened veterans! It's your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the most precarious pile of rocks in Osterra‚ÄîThe Serpent's Pass! üêç Boy oh boy, you can feel the altitude sickness kicking in already, and the fans are absolutely losing their minds! The Zmeigorod Snessengers are the talk of the town, and looking at this crowd, you'd think Valos the Eternal herself was handing out free gold! The Greenwatch has showed up too, though they look a bit out of their element away from their hallowed ground. 

Speaking of ritual, let‚Äôs look at the pre-game prep! Over in the Snessengers' dugout, Delija Dowling just downed a raw egg, shell and all! That‚Äôs what I call a crunchy start! Meanwhile, Evalyn Pierrepont is meticulously polishing a helmet with a live snail. Slow and steady wins the race, or at least makes for a very slimy tackle! 

But don't count out the Greenwatch! Verne Methuselah is currently rubbing the Trollball all over her armpits for that extra 'grip'‚Äîdisgusting, yet effective! And Madea Mensch is hopping around with his bootlaces tied together. It‚Äôs a real circus out here, folks, and we haven't even started the bleeding yet! Sir Randy‚Äôs favorite rangers better watch their step, because this stadium is sinking faster than a lead weight in a bog! Let's get to the action! üõ°Ô∏è‚ö°
postGame:
# üèÜ THE FINAL WHISTLE: A BOG-SOAKED OVERTIME THRILLER! 

## üèüÔ∏è The Snessengers Slide to Victory! 

What a humdinger of a match! My voice is practically gone, but my spirit is soaring! We just witnessed a marathon of carnage that would make Lord Orzalon weep with joy! The Zmeigorod Snessengers have defended their sinking home turf with a 5-4 victory over The Greenwatch in a sudden-death Overtime that had the fans falling out of their seats‚Äîliterally, because of the rockslides! 

## ‚öîÔ∏è Early Brutality! 

The game started with a real crack as Evalyn Pierrepont showed the Greenwatch exactly why you don't bring a fancy bow to a Seax fight! She absolutely leveled Darin Berliner early on, sending her straight to the sidelines. Not to be outdone, Pierrepont went back for seconds, flattening Nobe Haukom and leaving the Greenwatch looking like they‚Äôd been run over by a wagon train! 

## üèÄ High-Stakes Scoring! 

But the Greenwatch wouldn't stay down! Rese Halpern showed some real gumption, dodging through the mud to dunk the ball right into the goal! It was a beautiful sight, folks‚Äîthe kind of play that makes you forget for a second that these Wardens are usually so insufferable. She really showed the Bog Queen's subjects how it's done early on! 

## ü©π The Healers' Heroics! 

Waldon Tadeo was working overtime in the Snessengers' pit, patching up Avaria Revell and getting her back into the fray just in time! Nariko Javed for the Greenwatch was no slouch either, wiggling those fingers to bring Darin Berliner back from the brink. It's a miracle anyone is still in one piece with the way Northway Orran was swinging that machete! 

## üå©Ô∏è Weathering the Storm! 

The Serpent's Pass lived up to its name! Between the altitude and the sinking field, the players were sliding around like greased pigs. Northway Orran managed a spectacular shot from center field despite the downpour, keeping the score neck-and-neck! You could see the frustration on the faces of the Greenwatch‚Äîprobably wishing they were back under their Scarred Oak! 

## ü©∏ Blood on the Grass! 

As we hit the second half, the violence only ramped up! Darin Berliner, seeking revenge, absolutely clobbered Dare Wynnie! Not to be outdone, Drona Jacklin put Kleinstein MacGregor into the dirt. It was a beautiful symphony of groans and clashing steel, a real treat for the senses! If only the Haven Lights could show this much backbone, maybe I wouldn't fall asleep during their matches! 

## üèπ The Warden's Resistance! 

Troy Jorgan for the Greenwatch managed a spectacular score from center field, momentarily silencing the Zmeigorod faithful. It looked like Sir Randy‚Äôs favorites might actually pull it off! I almost felt a tinge of disappointment, but then I remembered my favorite Corruptors are still the gold standard for brutality, so I just settled in for more mayhem! 

## üïí Overtime Madness! 

When the clock ran out at 4-4, we headed into Overtime! The tension was thicker than the swamp gas! Both teams were exhausted, breaths hitching in the thin air. The fans were chanting so loud you could barely hear the bones snapping as Goldenberg Rimola took out Avaria Revell with a massive hit! 

## üî± The Final Tussle! 

The tide turned when Delija Dowling finally got his hands on Darin Berliner, putting her out of commission for the final time. With the Greenwatch defense crumbling like the stadium walls, the path was clear! It was a masterpiece of tactical violence that would make even Dima the shadow king nod in approval! 

## üèÅ The Winning Dunk! 

Finally, the moment of truth! Arni Griffith, who had been giving the Trollball a heroic backstory all afternoon, finally became the hero of his own tale! He broke through the Greenwatch defense and slammed that leather head into the goal for the sudden-death win! The crowd erupted like a volcano, and I think the stadium sank another three inches! 

## üé§ Final Thoughts! 

Final score: Zmeigorod Snessengers 5, The Greenwatch 4! What a night for the bog-dwellers! Sir Randy and his Rangers are going home with bruised egos and even bruisier shins. Valos the Eternal must be cackling in her bog tonight! This is Nok the Corrupter signing off‚Äîkeep your weapons sharp and your healers close! See you next Tuesday for the playoffs! üëπ
